list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: He made a resolution to get up early.

list_definition.definition: an opinion or decision formally expressed by a group of people, eg at a public meeting

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: The meeting passed a resolution in favour/favor of allowing women to join the society.

list_definition.definition: the act of resolving (a problem etc).
